tv.matchstick.flint
类 FlintMediaControlIntent

java.lang.Object
  tv.matchstick.flint.FlintMediaControlIntent

public class FlintMediaControlIntent
extends java.lang.Object

Flint media control intent. Intent constants for use with the Flint MediaRouteProvider.
This class also contains utility methods for creating a control category for discovering Flint media routes that support a specific app and/or set of namespaces, to be used with MediaRouteSelector.

字段摘要

方法详细信息

categoryForFlint

public static java.lang.String categoryForFlint(java.lang.String applicationId)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Get flint category with application Id. Returns a custom control category for discovering Flint devices that support running the specified app, independent of whether the app is running or not.

参数：
applicationId - application's Id
返回：
flint category
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

categoryForRemotePlayback

public static java.lang.String categoryForRemotePlayback(java.lang.String applicationId)
                                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Get media remote playback category. Returns a custom control category for discovering Flint devices which support the default Android remote playback actions using the specified Flint player.

参数：
applicationId - application's id
返回：
media remote playback category
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

categoryForRemotePlayback

public static java.lang.String categoryForRemotePlayback()
Get default remote media playback category. Returns a custom control category for discovering Flint devices which support the Default Media Receiver.

返回：
media remote playback category
